Detailed Description

Obsolete, as it offers no benefit to the base-class Window.

Specifies the selection of the user.

Member Function Documentation

BOOLEAN DialogWindow::OnCancel (   )  [protected, virtual]
 

Closes the window, if it gets the message Message::WinCancelMsg.

See also:
Window::OnCancel

BOOLEAN DialogWindow::OnConfirm (   )  [protected, virtual]
 

Closes the window, if it gets the message Message::WinConfirmMsg.

See also:
